org.darkimport.omeglespy_z.mediation
Class OmegleSpyConversationCoordinator

java.lang.Object
  org.darkimport.omeglespy_z.mediation.OmegleSpyConversationCoordinator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class OmegleSpyConversationCoordinator
extends Object
implements Observer

This class does the work of managing connections, interpreting omegle events and translating OmegleEvents into OmegleSpyEvents and passing the OmegleSpyEvents onto interested OmegleSpyConversationListeners.

Version:
$Id: $
Author:
user

Constructor Detail

OmegleSpyConversationCoordinator

public OmegleSpyConversationCoordinator(List<OmegleSpyConversationListener> activeListeners,
                                        String[] conversantNames,
                                        String[] serverNames)
Construct a coordinator.

Parameters:
activeListeners - A list of OmegleSpyConversationListeners. This list may be null. Additionally, listeners may be added later.
conversantNames - A list of conversants. Each of the names must be unique or unexpected results may occur. We do not check for uniqueness.
serverNames - A list of host names or IP addresses to which to connect. This list does not have to be equal in size with the conversantNames list, but it must have at least one element. If the list sizes are not equal, we associate each name with the corresponding element in the server list until we get to the last element. At that point, we associate each subsequent name with the last element of the servername list.
Method Detail

update

public void update(Observable o,
                   Object arg)
Called when a connection generates an OmegleEvent (not to be confused with an OmegleSpyEvent). The event is then translated into an OmegleSpyEvent, passed on to the other connection, or both.

Specified by:
update in interface Observer
